definition: to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)

sentences.english: That is the only way a style can be cultivated by a beginner.
sentences.chinese: 初学者只有借这个方法，才能培植出他的文体。

sentences.english: By supporting these people, the aristocracy could also cultivate their own power.
sentences.chinese: 他们共养这么多人，也是培植自己的势力。

sentences.english: Chromosome numbers of several cultivated plants from Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海地区若干种栽培植物的染色体数目。

sentences.english: This land isn't good for growing plants.
The wine is made from organically-grown grapes.
sentences.chinese: 这酒是用有机肥料培植长成的葡萄制成的。

sentences.english: To foster those flowers, caring is a need.
sentences.chinese: 为了培植那些鲜花，关爱和照顾是必不可少的。

sentences.english: Male-Pattern Baldness Found Rooted in Stem Cells.
sentences.chinese: 科学家研究用干细胞培植发囊治疗男性秃头。

sentences.english: Medicinal plants are supplied through collection from wild populations and cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 药用植物通过收集野生生物种群和栽培植物来提供。

sentences.english: The active oxygen radicals of cultured bezoar have been studied by chemiluminescence.
sentences.chinese: 运用化学发光技术研究了培植牛黄的活性氧自由基。

sentences.english: Ince toyed with the Celtic defence before clipping a delightful ball into the path of Suso.
sentences.chinese: 因斯风骚的技术一次次培植著凯尔特人的防线。

sentences.english: Scientists' efforts to create the world's first blue rose have, well, come up roses.
sentences.chinese: 科学家已经成功培植出了世界上第一株蓝色玫瑰。

sentences.english: The company is planning to lease that building once it relocates .
sentences.chinese: 该公司正打算培植的租赁一旦搬迁。

sentences.english: He knows little about vegetable cultivation.
Engineered skin tissue is already used in wound and burn repair.
sentences.chinese: 培植的皮肤组织可以用来进行外伤和烧伤修复。

sentences.english: No one excelled Pomona in love of the garden and the culture of fruit.
sentences.chinese: 在爱护花草培植水果方面没有人能比得上波摩娜。

definition: to grow/to cultivate/to train/to educate/to patronize
to root out/to eradicate/to sweep away/to abolish
to rope in/fig. to involve sb/to entice
to gather (people)/to collect (talent)/to come to an end
to rely on sb for support
to check and balance (power)/checks and balances
